General.Name: G.I. Tech Co. Ltd.
General.Description: G.I. Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of special-purpose machinery products in South Korea. The company manufactures and supplies slot dies, slit nozzles, and air knives. It offers products that are used in hydrogen fuel cell, medical, and special film fields; standard slot-dye for secondary cells; wide-width and functional slot dies for secondary battery; and functional option products comprising customize slot dies, coating rollers, and chemical supply systems. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Asan, South Korea.
